titleInfo.title: [Letter] 1841 Jun. 8, Jackson, Ten[nessee] [to] Mary Jane Chester, Columbia, Ten[nessee]

mods.note: This document is a letter written by Robert J. Chester to his daughter, Mary Jane Chester, on June 8, 1841. In the letter, Robert tells Mary Jane that her brother John and aunt Narcissa will come to get her from the Female Institute in Columbia after her examinations and take her first to the Hermitage, in Nashville, Tennessee, and then on home. He also mentions several of the events that have happened at home recently.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.
